welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beausoleil, a charming city known for its beautiful beaches, delicious cuisine, and rich history. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to discover all that our city has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fontvieille Heliport Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for domestic and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mandelieu Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
